file.title: AMM PART II-1285 - CHAPTER 24-34-01-06 - APU STARTER/GENERATOR - INSPECTION/CHECK

page.data: AIRCRAFT MAINTENANCE MANUAL APU STARTER/GENERATOR - INSPECTION/CHECK EFFECTIVITY: ALL 1. General A. This section gives the procedures to do the detailed visual inspection of the APU starter/generator brushes and the visual inspection of the APU starter/generator installation. B. The procedures in this section are given in the sequence below. The tasks identified with ( ♦) are part of the Scheduled Maintenance Requirements Document (SMRD). TASK NUMBER DESCRIPTION EFFECTIVITY APU STARTER/GENERATOR BRUSHES - ALL 24-34-01-200-801-A DETAILED VISUAL INSPECTION APU STARTER/GENERATOR INSTALLA- ALL 24-34-01-200-802-A TION - VISUAL INSPECTION EMB-145 - AMM 1285 General 24-34-01 Page 1 of 7 Rev 48 - Oct 30/15 Copyright ÃÂ© by Embraer S.A. All rights reserved - See title page for details.

AIRCRAFT MAINTENANCE MANUAL TASK 24-34-01-200-801-A EFFECTIVITY: ALL 2. APU STARTER/GENERATOR BRUSHES - DETAILED VISUAL INSPECTION A. General (1) The function of this task is to do an inspection on the brushes for their remaining life. B. References REFERENCE DESIGNATION AMM TASK 24-34-01-000-801-A/400 APU STARTER/GENERATOR - REMOVAL AMM TASK 24-34-01-400-801-A/400 APU STARTER GENERATOR - INSTALLATION AMM TASK 49-11-00-000-801-A/400 APU COWLING - REMOVAL AMM TASK 49-11-00-400-801-A/400 APU COWLING - INSTALLATION C. Zones and Accesses ZONE PANEL/DOOR LOCATION 313 Tail cone D. Tools and Equipment Not Applicable E. Auxiliary Items Not Applicable F. Consumable Materials Not Applicable G. Expandable Parts Not Applicable H. Persons Recommended QTY FUNCTION PLACE 1 Does the task Tail cone I. Preparation SUBTASK 841-002-A (1) Remove the APU cowling ( AMM TASK 49-11-00-000-801-A/400). J. Inspect (Detailed Inspection) APU Starter/Generator Brushes (Figure 601) SUBTASK 220-002-A (1) Remove the brush access cover. (2) Use a stiff wire hook and remove the brushes from their holders. EMB-145 - AMM 1285 200-801-A/600 24-34-01 Page 2 of 7 Rev 48 - Oct 30/15 Copyright ÃÂ© by Embraer S.A. All rights reserved - See title page for details.

AIRCRAFT MAINTENANCE MANUAL (3) Make an analysis of the remaining life of the brushes. Do a check of the wear groove, on the side of the brushes. (4) If the wear groove shows less than 1/2 of remaining life, replace all brushes. For this, it is necessary to replace the APU starter/generator with a different one, in conditions for flight ( AMM TASK 24-34-01-000-801-A/400 and AMM TASK 24-34-01-400-801-A/ 400). Send the starter/generator with the worn-out brushes to a workshop for replacement of the brushes. Refer to the latest revision of the Component Maintenance Manual with Illustrated Parts List for DC Starter-Generator, 23080 Series III by Lucas Aerospace. (5) If the wear groove is within the limits, install the brushes back on their holders. (6) Install the brush access cover. K. Follow-on SUBTASK 842-002-A (1) Install the APU cowling ( AMM TASK 49-11-00-400-801-A/400). EMB-145 - AMM 1285 200-801-A/600 24-34-01 Page 3 of 7 Rev 48 - Oct 30/15 Copyright ÃÂ© by Embraer S.A. All rights reserved - See title page for details.

AIRCRAFT MAINTENANCE MANUAL TASK 24-34-01-200-802-A EFFECTIVITY: ALL 3. APU STARTER/GENERATOR INSTALLATION - VISUAL INSPECTION A. General (1) The function of this task is to do a check of the APU starter/generator installation for general conditions. B. References REFERENCE DESIGNATION AMM TASK 49-11-00-000-801-A/400 APU COWLING - REMOVAL AMM TASK 49-11-00-400-801-A/400 APU COWLING - INSTALLATION AMM TASK 49-15-00-000-801-A/400 APU COWLING - REMOVAL AMM TASK 49-15-00-400-801-A/400 APU COWLING - INSTALLATION C. Zones and Accesses ZONE PANEL/DOOR LOCATION 300 313 Tail cone D. Tools and Equipment Not Applicable E. Auxiliary Items Not Applicable F. Consumable Materials Not Applicable G. Expandable Parts Not Applicable H. Persons Recommended QTY FUNCTION PLACE 1 Does the task Tail cone I. Preparation SUBTASK 841-003-A NOTE: You must do the inspection in usually available lighting conditions (daylight, hangar lighting, flashlights, or droplight). (1) Remove the APU cowling ( AMM TASK 49-11-00-000-801-A/400) or ( AMM TASK 49-15-00-000-801-A/400), as applicable. EMB-145 - AMM 1285 200-802-A/600 24-34-01 Page 5 of 7 Rev 48 - Oct 30/15 Copyright ÃÂ© by Embraer S.A. All rights reserved - See title page for details.

AIRCRAFT MAINTENANCE MANUAL J. Inspection Procedure (Figure 602) SUBTASK 212-002-A (1) Do the inspection as follows: (a) Examine the APU starter/generator, air ducts, clamps, and electrical cables for general conditions, clear deterioration, damage, or irregular condition. (b) Examine the electrical connections for overheating or discoloration. K. Follow-on SUBTASK 842-003-A (1) Install the APU cowling ( AMM TASK 49-11-00-400-801-A/400) or ( AMM TASK 49-15-00-400-801-A/400), as applicable.
